name: Super Stick Party
description:
Super Stick Party is a game made for Ludum Dare 46. Theme: Keep it alive

You are the manager of a club and have to attend your guest's wishes to keep the party running! Can you manage to beat all 5 challenges?

Play with headphones for best experience!

DISCLAIMER: Contains flashy images. Better not play this if you have problems with epileptic seizures.

Controls:

Mouse: Interact

Alt + Enter: Toggle Fullscreen

---------------------------------------

Credits:

Nehvis: Programming (Godot), Art (Aseprite)

Draquise: Music (FL Studio)

Smileys by Vectors Market and Freepik
